title: STAR WARS™ - X-Wing Alliance™
notes: Game won't start without controller (I tested with X-Box One S controller) - but it's the same behaviour as under Windows. It seems to work fine, but needs a lot of tweaking to run well (but again, seems like exactly same tweaks are needed under Windows). More info about tweaks: https://steamcommunity.com/app/361670/discussions/0/620712999965906230/
